name: milkdown-crepe-umd
description: A self-updating UMD distribution of the @milkdown/crepe package.

scripts.build:js: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.copyFileSync('src/index.js', 'src/index.js.original.bak'); const originalContent = fs.readFileSync('src/index.js', 'utf8'); const modifiedContent = originalContent.replace(/import '\@milkdown\/crepe\/theme\/common\/style\.css';\nimport '\@milkdown\/crepe\/theme\/frame\.css';\n/, ''); fs.writeFileSync('src/index.js', modifiedContent);" && vite build && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('src/index.js.original.bak', 'src/index.js'); require('fs').unlinkSync('src/index.js.original.bak');"
scripts.transform:css-assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const version = require('./package.json').version; const sourceCssDir = 'dist/temp-css'; const targetVersionedDir = `dist/${version}`; const targetLatestDir = 'dist/latest'; const versionedCssFileName = `milkdown-crepe-bundle.${version}.umd.css`; const latestCssFileName = `milkdown-crepe-bundle.umd.css`; fs.mkdirSync(targetVersionedDir, { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync(targetLatestDir, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(sourceCssDir).forEach(file => { if (file.endsWith('.css')) { const oldPath = path.join(sourceCssDir, file); fs.copyFileSync(oldPath, path.join(targetVersionedDir, versionedCssFileName)); fs.copyFileSync(oldPath, path.join(targetLatestDir, latestCssFileName)); } });"
scripts.copy:latest-js-and-css: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const version = require('./package.json').version; const versionedDir = `dist/${version}`; const latestDir = `dist/latest`; fs.readdirSync(versionedDir).forEach(file => { if (file.endsWith('.js') && file.includes(`.${version}.`)) { fs.copyFileSync(path.join(versionedDir, file), path.join(latestDir, file.replace(`.${version}.`, '.'))); } else if (file.endsWith('.css') && file.includes(`.${version}.`)) { fs.copyFileSync(path.join(versionedDir, file), path.join(latestDir, file.replace(`.${version}.`, '.'))); } });"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run transform:css-assets && npm run copy:latest-js-and-css && npm run clean:temp-css
